DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test effectiveness two different weight loss intervention . Both intervention provide weight loss information twice weekly audio podcasts . In addition podcasts , participant ask track diet use either wearable device wrist app smartphone .
DOC.brief_title: Dietary Intervention Examining Tracking With Mobile Devices
DOC.detailed_description: This study last approximately 6 month . Participants attend one 1-hour orientation meeting begin study 2-hour baseline assessment train meeting . Additional assessment conduct 3 month 6 month . Weekly questionnaire administer . Everyone study ask listen 2 podcasts per week . Each podcasts take 15 - 20 minute listen participant expect spend 30 - 40 minute week listen podcasts . Participants also randomize either track diet app smartphone use device wear wrist . Each week , participant send email reminder use diet track device . They also encourage monitor exercise body weight .
DOC.criteria: Must 1865 year old Own use smartphone and/or tablet data plan BMI must 2549.9 kg/m2 Must willing reduce caloric intake increase physical activity Not currently participate weight loss study weight loss study involve podcasts Over age 65 year old Currently participate weight loss program Has lose 10 pound past 6 month Diagnosed stroke heart attack Diagnosed diabetes control use medication
